basic_node.title: Small area of primary reciever optics
basic_node.description: Limited field of view of primary reciever optics, determined by size of beam-recieving photo diode.
basic_node.references: [re1, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: System factor K: Cross section A; p.6-7]
